amendment.description: To strike the provisions relating to the treatment of certain excise taxes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 23 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 23 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S1405-1406; text: CR S1405) To strike the provisions relating to the treatment of certain excise taxes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 23 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 23 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Grassley.
